verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ye servants of God,
your Master proclaim,
and publish abroad
his wonderful name;
the name all victorious
of Jesus extol;
his kingdom is glorious,
and rules over all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God ruleth on high,
almighty to save;
and still He is nigh,
his presence we have;
the great congregation
his triumph shall sing,
ascribing salvation
to Jesus our King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
'Salvation to God,
who sits on the throne!'
let all cry aloud,
and honour the Son:
the praises of Jesus
all angels proclaim,
fall down on their faces,
and worship the Lamb.

verse.name: v4
